plot outline: Thomson Villa is a movie which revolves around the story of Girl who struggles alot in life,who then come to take care of Kid Thoman as part job son of well known Wealthy parents. Kid being difficult to handle by teachers and servants. Some things happened to the life of the Kid. Sheelu tries to find the mystery of the family.
